title: Colm Gildernew – 2022 Comments on Tackling Child Waiting Lists
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Colm Gildernew, the MLA for Fermanagh and South Tyrone, on 27 October 2022.
content:
Fresh figures released by the Department of Health today on the number of children waiting to see a consultant are staggering and reinforce the immediate need to fix the health service.
